format:
A data frame with 704 rows representing individual bakers per episode
and 6 variables:
description:
Description
Details about the three challenges (signature, technical, and showstopper)
for each baker/episode across all 10 GBBO series.
title: Each episodes' challenges (raw)

parameters.baker: A character string giving given or nickname.
parameters.technical:
An integer denoting the rank on the technical challenge
for that baker/episode. A rank of 1 is winner of the technical
challenge.
parameters.episode: A factor denoting episode number within a series.
parameters.showstopper:
A character string containing the bake for the
showstopper challenge for that baker/episode.
parameters.signature:
A character string containing the bake for the signature
challenge for that baker/episode.
